def_cn: 收买，贿赂，恐吓(委员会等)
def_en: If someone nobbles an important group of people such as a committee, they offer them money or threaten them in order to make them do something.

def_cn: (赛马前用药物等)害(马)使其不能取胜
def_en: If someone nobbles a racehorse, they deliberately harm it, often using drugs, in order to prevent it from winning a race.
If someone nobbles your plans or chances of succeeding, they prevent you from achieving what you want.
